long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Block: Secure Your Browser from the Misuse of Chromes Built-in AI ğŸ›‘ 

Overview
With the introduction of built-in AI capabilities in browsers, such as Chrome's Gemini Nano, web applications can now perform AI-powered tasks locally, without the need for server-side processing. While this innovation offers remarkable benefits like enhanced privacy, reduced latency, and offline functionality, it also introduces potential risks. AI Block is designed to mitigate these risks by providing users the power to control and block the use of the window.ai API in their browsers completely.

ğŸ™‹ Why AI Block? 
The window.ai API, a powerful interface for on-device AI, has transformative potential. However, if misused, it could lead to several risks:

ğŸ•µï¸ Privacy Concerns: 
Despite local processing, malicious scripts could leverage AI capabilities to analyze sensitive data without user consent.

ğŸ™…â€â™€ï¸ Unauthorised Resource Use: 
AI models, particularly sophisticated ones like Gemini Nano, are resource-intensive. Malicious websites might exploit these AI capabilities, leading to significant performance degradation or battery drain.

ğŸ“Š Data Integrity Attacks: 
On-device AI could be used to alter or fabricate content, potentially misleading users or manipulating information without their knowledge.

ğŸ‘® Security Vulnerabilities: 
As with any new technology, the integration of AI into browsers can introduce new attack vectors for malicious entities.


Features
ğŸ«·Complete Blockage of window.ai: 
Prevent any access to or execution of the window.ai API, ensuring that no unwanted AI processes run in your browser.

ğŸ›¡ï¸ Real-time Protection: AI Block actively monitors and blocks attempts to invoke window.ai, protecting your device from unauthorised use in real-time.

ğŸ¤– Works Automatically: 
Easy to use, disable AI functionalities across all websites without lifting a finger. Just install!


Join the Responsible AI Usage Movement
AI Block is not just a tool; it's a movement towards responsible AI usage in web technologies. By installing AI Block, you are taking a crucial step in safeguarding your digital environment from potential abuses of emerging AI integrations in browsers.

Installation and Setup
Easy to install, AI Block integrates seamlessly with your Chrome browser. Get started in just a few clicks and take control of how AI is used in your browser.

Feedback and Support
Your feedback is invaluable in shaping the future of AI Block. Feel free to message the dev!

Download AI Block today and take control of AI in your browser!
